title: League of Legends - Vayne ADC Montage #1 - By Xiggasaur

embed.description: Hey guys! This is my first ever vayne montage. It required a whole lot of hard work and dedication to get all the clips and do the edit in just under 2 weeks, i didn't use footage from months ago. I'm only in Gold 5, so mechanically i tried my best.

body: Hey guys! This is my first ever vayne montage. It required a whole lot of hard work and dedication to get all the clips and do the edit in just under 2 weeks, i didn't use footage from months ago. I'm only in Gold 5, so mechanically i tried my best. I really hope you enjoy the video, because i surely enjoyed making it!

replies.body: epic watched from start to finish gud stuff
much iggy fanci edit but where da me{{champion:121}} nix at???
i tried my best to get as much good clips as possible in 2 weeks, its hard.
